resources.string: The application needs to have write access to the external storage to store the image in preparation for sharing it through other applications
The operation was not performed because the necessary permissions were not granted to implement it

string-array.name: answer_description
string-array.item: Placed above ghutra / hatta to keep it from moving
Padded with wool, worn in the winter to prevent cold
One of the traditional types of Bedouin fabric
It is used to dye hair and beard, and it is also used to beautify hands for women
The bowl used to serve coffee for Arabs
Made of leather, worn in the foot, it was famous ancient times among the Arabs
A small white weapon placed on the waist
The name of the tool that was used for lighting in the past
A tool used for lighting and decoration
A red hat famous in Sham, Egypt and Morocco
An Arab dress worn frequently in the Gulf countries
